title: Domestic Energy Performance Certificates for existing dwellings

versions.title: Domestic Energy Performance Certificates for existing dwellings
versions.summary: Data from certificates for existing domestic properties lodged on the Energy Performance of Buildings Registers, by average energy efficiency rating
versions.description: This data relates to the Energy Performance of Buildings Certificates published alongside the Energy Performance of Buildings Certificates Statistical release May to July 2023.

columns.name: Period
columns.description: The time period associated with the observation.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: The name associated with The geography code.

columns.name: Efficiency Rating
columns.description: The scale of energy efficiency rating on a scale of A to G with A being the most efficient and G being the least efficient.
